channel.title: My faggot memory card
channel.description: okay, i have a mirco-SD Toshiba memory card and i use it with my LG rummor cell phone. Ever since the first time i plugged it into my phone, the phone did some shit to it and made it "right protected" and now i can't add/or remove anything from the memory card. help me please

item.title: My faggot memory card
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

[quote=“thefalloffuckingtroy., post:7, topic:240829”][quote author=Satan` link=topic=317138.msg2517525#msg2517525 date=1225688118]
Yeah, there is a good chance that is the problem, I’d recommend returning it.
[/quote] fuck, how am i supposed to do that[/quote]
By going to the store.

Read full topic

item.title: My faggot memory card
item.dc:creator: @thefalloffuckingtroy thefalloffuckingtroy.
item.description:
@thefalloffuckingtroy wrote:

[quote=“Satan`, post:4, topic:240829”]Do you have a card reader on your computer? If you do try to reformat it.

Chances are that if it doesn’t have that switch then it is corrupted and is being mistaken for write protected, either reformat or return/exchange.[/quote]

i tried that, and it won’t let me because its still “write protected”. i can’t do shit with it, i blame it on my rummor, its a piece of shit anyways, but um yeah. it could be corrupted because a long time ago i kinda got the Mini-sd card stuck inside the memory card slot inside the phone and i had to rip it out. maybe that fucked it up, idk.

Read full topic

item.title: My faggot memory card
item.dc:creator: @Satan4 Satan`
item.description:
@Satan4 wrote:

Do you have a card reader on your computer? If you do try to reformat it.

Chances are that if it doesn’t have that switch then it is corrupted and is being mistaken for write protected, either reformat or return/exchange.

Read full topic

item.title: My faggot memory card
item.dc:creator: @thefalloffuckingtroy thefalloffuckingtroy.
item.description:
@thefalloffuckingtroy wrote:

yeah i checked for that first thing.

Read full topic

item.title: My faggot memory card
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

Write protected means that you cannot add or delete stuff from the memory card. There is usually a little switch on the side of some memory cards with a lock/unlock sign. Set that to unlocked if you have it. If not then I have no idea.

Read full topic
